name: Mom Koser's Pecan Ginger Loaf
comments: You can also bake 2 loaves in smaller pans or 6 mini loaves. Reduce baking time to 35 minutes or until toothpick inserted into center comes out clean.
instructions: Beat butter and sugar until creamed. Add eggs one at a time and mix. In separate bowl, stir together flour and spices. Add flour mixture to cream mixture alternately with water; beat well after each addition. Add pumpkin and beat to blend, then add nuts and stir.
Turn into buttered 9x5x3" loaf pan; spread until smooth and even.
Bake at 350 degrees for 60-70 minutes. Allow to cool in pan for 10 minutes, then remove to wire rack.
